data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 4,711 believers in Dakar and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Dakar, Senegal
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Dakar, Senegal.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, make the 4,711 believers in Dakar to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 2,426,388 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the state of Dakar access to a Bible in their own language.
Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Jahanka people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Jesus, 2,431,100 people live in the state of Dakar. Please, give them 486 new simple churches this year.
Jesus, please help the 4,711 believers in the state of Dakar to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.

data.section_summary:
the state of Dakar, Senegal has a population of 2,431,100.

We estimate Dakar has 4,711 people who might know Jesus, 111,388 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,315,000 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 516 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Dakar, Senegal to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.
